DOC.brief_summary: Selecting different acupoints combination acupoints key factor clinical efficacy acupuncture . Different combination acupoints generate different clinical efficacy . So , purpose study determine different clinical efficacy among three type combination acupoints treatment primary insomnia .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed insomnia base Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fifth Edition,2013 , American psychiatric association PSQI score > 7 AIS score ≥6 SDS ≤60 SAS ≤60 Age 18 65 year old Not involved clinical trial last 6 month screen Have ability write inform consent . Breathingrelated sleep disorder Circadian rhythm sleepwake disorder Medicationinduced sleep disorder Substance induce sleep disorder , alcohol , coffee , strong tea Secondary insomnia cause systemic disease cause external environment disturbance Pregnant lactate woman Combined serious cardiovascular , lung , liver , kidney , hematopoietic system , mental disease Advanced malignant tumor serious debilitate disease Location acupoints combine infection bleeding Declined acupuncture Could n't provide write informed consent .
